name: market for potato grading | potato grading | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9117/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'potato grading', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;Potato grading' is a service that grades 1 kg of potatoes. A user employing this module should add the input material of 1 kg potatoes as well as any resulting waste.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'potato grading',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  potato grading', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0163:Post-harvest crop activities
